DOC.brief_summary: This open-label, single arm study evaluated the efficacy and safety of RoActemra/Actemra (tocilizumab) in patients with rheumatoid arthritis. Patients received RoActemra/Actemra 8 mg/kg intravenously every 4 weeks, alone or in combination with standard anti-rheumatic therapy, for 12 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of RoActemra/Actemra (Tocilizumab) in Adult Patients With Rheumatoid Arthritis (SVOBODA Programme)
